md:
giải nghĩa từ "stops" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Stops (noun) - Điểm dừng
	+ Meaning: A place where a bus, train, or other vehicle stops to let people get on or off.
	+ Example: The bus stops at the corner of Main Street.
	+ Related words: station, terminal, halt
	+ Antonyms: departure, origin

* Stops (verb) - Dừng lại
	+ Meaning: To bring something to an end or to a standstill.
	+ Example: The music stops when the singer finishes the song.
	+ Related words: halt, cease, pause
	+ Antonyms: continue, start, resume

* Stops (noun) - Phím dừng
	+ Meaning: A device that is used to stop something from moving or functioning.
	+ Example: The emergency stops on the elevator are designed to prevent accidents.
	+ Related words: brake, block, barrier
	+ Antonyms: accelerator, trigger, activator
html:
giải nghĩa từ "stops" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Stops (noun) - Điểm dừng

    • Meaning: A place where a bus, train, or other vehicle stops to let people get on or off.
    • Example: The bus stops at the corner of Main Street.
    • Related words: station, terminal, halt
    • Antonyms: departure, origin

  • Stops (verb) - Dừng lại

    • Meaning: To bring something to an end or to a standstill.
    • Example: The music stops when the singer finishes the song.
    • Related words: halt, cease, pause
    • Antonyms: continue, start, resume

  • Stops (noun) - Phím dừng

    • Meaning: A device that is used to stop something from moving or functioning.
    • Example: The emergency stops on the elevator are designed to prevent accidents.
    • Related words: brake, block, barrier
    • Antonyms: accelerator, trigger, activator
